about_the_game:
INCOMER is a retro-styled 90s first-person shooter game which pitches you against hordes of alien intruders in an attempt to contain a fallen base. With only a small array of weapons and limited ammo, you must fight through six claustrophobic levels as you attempt to contain the outbreak - alien by alien.

Although your gun can tear through enemies quickly, you are only human. Only a few hits may be enough to kill you. In INCOMER, you should always plan your approach carefully.

INCOMER uses a RPG system mechanic to roll enemy stats every time they spawn, meaning that no two enemies will ever be the same.

FEATURING,.,,

  • Amazing graphics and sound
  • An engaging single player campaign
  • An array of atmospheric sound effects
  • Written exclusively for Steam
  • Six nail-biting levels of puzzles, traps, and a host of mean, ugly, and nasty alien creatures

With only a small array of weapons and limited ammo, you must fight through six claustrophobic levels as you attempt to contain the outbreak - alien by alien.

Although your gun can tear through enemies quickly, you are only human. Only a few hits may be enough to kill you. In INCOMER, you should always plan your approach carefully.

INCOMER uses a RPG system mechanic to roll enemy stats every time they spawn, meaning that no two enemies will ever be the same.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs

name: INCOMER

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable

short_description: First-person action game against hordes of alien intruders.
